message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I believe it's a fantastic deal and will be valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $200 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $170. This is my final offer.
I'm still a bit far from my budget. I can do $140, but that's as high as I can go.
